revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Aether Foundation |image = [[File:Aether Foundation.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Aether Foundation. |tokens = 1,080,000 |location = North of Aether Paradise }}
<!--T:2--> '''Aether Foundation''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Alola]]. It initially has 125 tiles arranged in two floors: 10x10 and 5x5 in size, respectively; including 15 chest tiles, 36 non-boss encounter tiles, 1 ladder tile, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 15,619,682 HP.
== Encounter Tables == <!--T:3-->
